title: Louisa County Sheriff investigating shooting death
content:
LOUISA COUNTY, Va. (NEWSPLEX) -- The Louisa County Sheriff's Office says a man has died after being shot Friday.
Twenty-five-year-old Joseph Brenden Hudson died after the shooting on Daniel Road.
According to the sheriff's office, he suffered from a single gunshot wound.
Investigators are trying to determine if the shooting was accidental or if there will be charges filed.
The investigation is ongoing, and officials have spoken to witnesses as well as a possible suspect who stayed at the scene after the shooting.
